articles.author: Jess Weatherbed
articles.title: Meta ordered to stop training its AI on Brazilian personal data - The Verge
articles.description: Brazil’s data protection authority has banned Meta from training its AI models on images and other personal data from Brazilian Facebook and Instagram accounts.
